references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the proposed method as it provides a high-quality video generation model that is leveraged and fine-tuned in the LeviTor framework.
This paper introduces the core concept of video diffusion models that LeviTor builds upon, significantly impacting the overall architecture and performance.

references.paper_title: The 2019 DAVIS challenge on VOS: unsupervised multi-object segmentation
references.reason: This paper provides the dataset upon which the LeviTor model is trained, forming the basis for its effective object motion and 3D trajectory learning.
This paper provides a high-quality object mask annotation method which is crucial for extracting the control signals used in LeviTor for object manipulation.

references.paper_title: MotionCtrl: A unified and flexible motion controller for video generation
references.reason: This paper provides a trajectory control method for video generation that LeviTor leverages as a baseline to improve and extend in 3D context.
